sources.title: Heartaches (1947) Crime, Drama, Mystery Full Length Movie
sources.description:
Up-and-coming Hollywood actor/crooner, Vic Morton, has a secret. He starts receiving death threats in the mail and an attempt on his life is made. Soon after, two of his associates are murdered. Who is behind it all?

Director: Basil Wrangell
Writers: George Bricker, Monte Collins 
Stars: Sheila Ryan, Edward Norris, Chill Wills
Genres: Classics, Crime, Drama, Mystery 

@CultCinemaClassics:
